10544-PetBattle-.name: View details about your summoned pet.\n<font color="#909090">Pets can be summoned by double-clicking them from your inventory. Monsters around the world can be tamed as combat pets starting at level 50.</font>

10551--.name: Set up macros to chain skills together.\n<font color="#909090">You can use macros to configure multiple skills to a <font color="#00a2ed">single key</font>. Just hold the key to use the set skills in quick succession. Configure a macro for every occasion!</font>

10570--.name: Enjoy mini-games.\n<font color="#00a2ed">The Maple Arcade</font><font color="#909090"> has all kinds of mini-games to play. Earn rewards and see where you land in the rankings.</font>

10761--.name: Virtue Runes\n<font color="#909090">You can create virtue runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Magic Guardstones</font> from Mystery Boxes and <font color="#00a2ed">Ore Scraps</font> from mining. Virtue runes can be used to strengthen equipment.</font>

10762--.name: Rebirth Runes\n<font color="#909090"> You can create rebirth runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Spirit Guardstones</font> from Mystery Boxes and <font color="#00a2ed">Feed Scraps</font> from tending animals. Rebirth runes reset the enchantment level of gear.</font>

10763--.name: Defiance Rune Guide\n<font color="#909090"> You can create defiance runes using <font color="#00a2ed">Defiance Crystals</font> from failed enchantments and <font color="#00a2ed">Ore Scraps</font> from mining. 10764--.name: Taming Pets\n<font color="#909090">After reaching level 50, you can use <font color="#00a2ed">candy packs</font> to pacify hungry monsters and <font color="#00a2ed">snares</font> to tame them as your pet.</font>

10765--.name: Tame and capture hungry monsters to use them as pets.\n<font color="#909090">You can pacify a hungry monster by feeding it <font color="#00a2ed">$itemPlural:63000000$</font, which is sold by supply merchants in major cities. 10766--.name: You've got some $itemPlural:63000000$.\n<font color="#909090">Throw them at <font color="#00a2ed">hungry monsters</font> to <font color="#00a2ed">pacify</font> them. Lead a docile monster into a <font color="#00a2ed">sbare</font> capture them as a pet.

10860--.name: You've earned an attribute point.\n<font color="#909090">Attribute points can be earned as rewards for </font><font color="#00a2ed">exploring areas, earning trophies, completing chapters, and so on.</font> <font color="#909090">You can use them to increase your </font><font color="#00a2ed">strength, dexterity, intelligence, luck, critical rate, and health.</font>
